channel.title: CVE Feed for Pandora.tv -- KMPlayer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pandora.tv -- KMPlayer

item.title: CVE-2018-5200|2024-08-05T05:26:46.988Z -- pandora.tv -- kmplayer
item.description: KMPlayer 4.2.2.15 and earlier have a Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability. It could be exploited with a crafted FLV format file. The problem is that more frame data is copied to heap memory than the size specified in the frame header. This results in a memory corruption and remote code execution.
